Content: “Bloodline” is a 2019 American psychological horror film directed by Henry Jacobson in his directorial debut. The film was written by Avra Fox-Lerne, Will Honley and Jacobson. It stars Seann William Scott, Mariela Garriga, Dale Dickey and Kevin Carroll. The film is a co-production between Divide/Conquer and Blumhouse Productions.[2] Evan values family above all else, and anyone who gets between him, his wife, and newborn son learns that the hard way. But when it comes to violent tendencies, it seems the apple does not fall far from the tree. The film will be released on 20th of this month by Momentum Pictures.
